name: CC-Featured-Image-Column
author: Clearcode

sections.description: This plugin adds a column with post’s featured image before the title column on wp-admin posts list.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress Dashboard

  1. Go to ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘CC-Featured-Image-Column’
  3. Activate the plugin from the Plugin section on your WordPress Dashboard.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download ‘CC-Featured-Image-Column’.
  2. Upload the ‘cc-featured-image-column’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate the plugin from the Plugin section in your WordPress Dashboard.

Multisite

The plugin can be activated and used for just about any use case.

  • Activate at the site level to load the plugin on that site only.
  • Activate at the network level for full integration with all sites in your network (this is the most common type of multisite installation).
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

Release date: 01.03.2018

  • First stable version of the plugin.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

From your WordPress Dashboard

  1. Go to ‘Plugins > Add New’

  3. Activate the plugin from the Plugin section on your WordPress Dashboard.

From WordPress.org

  2. Upload the ‘cc-featured-image-column’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate the plugin from the Plugin section in your WordPress Dashboard.

Multisite

The plugin can be activated and used for just about any use case.

  • Activate at the site level to load the plugin on that site only.
  • Activate at the network level for full integration with all sites in your network (this is the most common type of multisite installation).
